replies.body: Lets go United!!
yeee
What do the numbers represent, a percentage, x amount of missions done??

Welcome to whose league is it anyway where everything's made up and the points don't matter
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

My guess is something like "House missions completed per capita", though 42-45 seems real high for that considering that there are something like 20 non-repeating House missions, and the repeating one didn't unlock until one finished the week's challenges...

But I know they said they were weighting each House against its population, so whatever it is, "per capita" figures in somehow.

Alone we perish
Together we fight
None, of us will fall
All of us will emerge to the top
United we stand, United we rise, United we'll be victorius!
Well Council, we had a good run. Wanna get some burgers?
What kinda fries?
Ill be there
Sure. Milkshakes or pop?
UNITED WE ARE STRONGER!

ONE OF US
_(It's the most innovative [MOBA] I've played in years!)_

We will not go quietly into the night!

We will not vanish without a fight!

We're going to live on!

We're going to survive!

For we are the UNITED!!
**United we Stand!**
FOR THE WARBAND!{{sticker:sg-syndra}}

**WARBAND STRONG**!
**SKILLED, AGGRESSIVE, RUTHLESS**!
Fight for what is **OURS WARBAND**! **GO WARBAND**!
Live for the **DUEL**, thrive on the **OUTPLAYS**! Don't forget what we represent **WARBAND**!
{{sticker:sg-syndra}} {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}} 
**GO WARBAND**! **We are #1**! **We are the BEST**! **WARBAND STRONG**!
Y'all are literally #2.... this is why you are losing.{{sticker:galio-happy}}
imagine choosing what streamers choose {{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}
You aren't completely wrong 2nd place is 1st place loser
i'm confused as to how it is 45, 43, 42, 42. what do these numbers represent?
Fairy magic levels. It's really simple if you think about it.
Faceless loss their faces.
but we red {{item:2140}}

they never were? faceless had a ton of people join and then stop playing league lmao
Council was ranked last first 2 weeks, looks like it's shifted out now, probably for the reason that you stated.
So who won? It's like the trials event just disappeared!!! Btw,The house's are a great idea, fun, and people rallied behind their house. Don't just wipe it of the map. Let's do more with the house's.
*dumble riot*- "50 points to The faceless (aka gryffindor) being heroic, fighting strong and just being red."{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

United

Never surrender
Fight 'till the end
Pick up our hearts
Our honor we will defend!

Group with the team
Fight as a pack
For we are **United**
And we ALWAYS come back.
Yes yes yes!!!
We are winning cause we actually unite in a teamfight instead of trying to 1v9 everyone or boss everyone around. Communism at it's finest bois {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I swear the United gang turns into Optimus Prime whenever there’s a comment section
Finish Strong United.This is no time to rest on your laurels,so c'mon United.We don't know what's at the end of the tunnel,but make sure it doesn't collapse until we're out.

United.

The strategist.
The playmaker.
That solo top laner that doesn't trust the rest.

You won't turn your back on me when I need you, nor will I you, because in the end, we had the same goal all along.
You're part of my team whether you want to admit it or not.
The strategist is council, the play maker is warband, the solo top who doesn’t need help is also warband.

"...doesn't trust the rest"

It's hard to trust if you don't have a face. I'd say Reaper Soraka was talking about Faceless there.
Did United win?
I think we did
YEAH!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Lets go **WARBAND**! **STEP UP YOUR GAME**! This is the week that matters most! Don't forget what we represent **WARBAND**! Lets go **WARBAND**!
{{sticker:sg-syndra}} {{sticker:sg-shisa}}

What _do_ you represent?  Just curious.

I found it funny on the original post about the houses how each house had their own top comment with a lot of responses.
The ones for Council were like "We play chess while others play checkers" or "Strategy will prevail!" etc.
The ones for United were like "Teamwork FTW!" or "We are strongest when fighting together" etc.
The ones for Faceless were like "We'll show them something new" or "You'll never see us coming!" etc.
Then I get to the Warband comments, and they're all like:
"Warband forever!"
"Let's go Warband!"
"Warband forever!"
"Go Warband!"
"WARBAANND!!!"

I got such a kick out of it, because most of the house's comments were specific to their house, but Warband was all just generic fanaticism.  Not necessarily a bad thing, since that can still carry you to victory, but like, are you fighting for anything besides a name or a color?

Either way, I wish you well.
When are they submitting results?? The suspense is killling meeee.{{sticker:sg-janna}}
Bruh its june third who tf won

War.. War never Changes
